titleStmt.title: Eleaven choice sermons as they were delivered by that late reverend divine, Thomas Westfield ...
titleStmt.author: Westfield, Thomas, 1573-1644.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J.D. and part of the impression to be vended for the use of Thomas Gibbes, Gent.,

notesStmt.note: Epistle to the reader signed: T.S.
"I have perused these sermons upon Psalmes 106:19, 20, &c., and judging them to be pious and profitable, I allow them to be printed and published. John Downame"--T.p. verso.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
